page.title: 05MURDER IN EAST SWINDON
page.content: The Mountford Manor School's catchment area consists of{council built {property}one or two of which have become privately owned. The southern boundary is Queen's Drive.To the south is private residential property known as Walcot West.That area is served by Lainesmead Primary Schools. The council area displays a number of indicators of social malaise such as high levels of{unemployment,one-parent {families,incidents of juvenile crime. There have been 5{murders}in the past 12 years.
